mainText:
Dear Steve,

it deeply saddened me today to find out you left us.

Savior of the now huge Apple Company, your views, your dreams and goals, 
all together represent what a Genius is in our Modern Era.

I bid you a personal farewell, Steve even if we never met in real life.

I will surely look for you when my time comes and hopefully then I will 
get to know you like I have dreamed so many times these past years.

Thank you for everything you have done for Mankind.
author: Emilio
